short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING. Replace the music in a streamed video with its accompaniment for YoutTube and BiliBili.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provide streaming of the accompany music together with the video.
AccompanimentBETA is designed for singers who wants to sing with accompaniment. It works on YouTube and BiliBili.
System: macos
Require a python3.9 interpreter with specific libraries.
